snippet.title: Super Bit Adventure - Update: A New Path Trailer
snippet.description:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/778640/Super_Bit_Adventure_Paragons_of_Life/

Welp, It's finally here. After months of hard work the new patch is finally done cooking. I truly hope you all enjoy the new content! Please tell all your friends and remember to rate the game! Every little bit helps! I would love to do a new contest for "Hard Mode" and see which of you are crazy enough to take the challenge :)

Patch Notes:

Paragon Talent System 

Achievements ( can also unlock new talent trees )

New Paragons

New Items

Hard Mode ( ...this is VERY action packed and difficult )

Please let me know if you notice any bugs! When i wake up from my minor coma I will make sure to fix anything you guys find. 

Have fun!
